verses.text: \w But|strong="H7451"\w* \w this|strong="H7489"\w* seemed \w very|strong="H1419"\w* \w wrong|strong="H7451"\w* \w to|strong="H7451"\w* \w Jonah|strong="H3124"\w* \w and|strong="H1419"\w* he \w became|strong="H2734"\w* \w angry|strong="H2734"\w*.

\w He|strong="H3588"\w* \w prayed|strong="H6419"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* 
d \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H1697"\w*, ‘Ah, 
d \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, wasn’t \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w what|strong="H1697"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w said|strong="H1697"\w* \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w still|strong="H3588"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w own|strong="H1961"\w* country? \w That|strong="H3588"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w why|strong="H5921"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w fled|strong="H1272"\w* \w at|strong="H5921"\w* \w once|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w Tarshish|strong="H8659"\w*; \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w knew|strong="H3045"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H1697"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w gracious|strong="H2587"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w merciful|strong="H7349"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*, patient, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* loving \w and|strong="H3068"\w* ready \w to|strong="H5704"\w* forgive.

\w Therefore|strong="H6258"\w*, \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w beg|strong="H4994"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*, \w take|strong="H3947"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w life|strong="H5315"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w me|strong="H4994"\w*; \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w better|strong="H2896"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w me|strong="H4994"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w die|strong="H4194"\w* \w than|strong="H4480"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w live|strong="H2416"\w*!’

\w But|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* said, ‘\w Are|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H3190"\w* \w doing|strong="H3190"\w* \w right|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w being|strong="H3068"\w* \w angry|strong="H2734"\w*?’

\w Then|strong="H1961"\w* \w Jonah|strong="H3124"\w* \w went|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w* \w and|strong="H5892"\w* \w sat|strong="H3427"\w* \w down|strong="H3427"\w* \w on|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w east|strong="H6924"\w* \w side|strong="H6924"\w*, \w and|strong="H5892"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w hut|strong="H5521"\w* \w for|strong="H5704"\w* \w himself|strong="H6213"\w* \w and|strong="H5892"\w* \w sat|strong="H3427"\w* \w under|strong="H8478"\w* \w it|strong="H6213"\w*, \w waiting|strong="H5704"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w what|strong="H4100"\w* \w would|strong="H6213"\w* \w become|strong="H1961"\w* \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* arranged \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* bush \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w grow|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w Jonah|strong="H3124"\w* \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w shade|strong="H6738"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w head|strong="H7218"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w make|strong="H8055"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* comfortable. \w The|strong="H5921"\w* bush \w gave|strong="H1961"\w* \w Jonah|strong="H3124"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w pleasure|strong="H8057"\w*;

\w but|strong="H5221"\w* \w at|strong="H5927"\w* \w dawn|strong="H7837"\w* \w the|strong="H5221"\w* \w next|strong="H4283"\w* \w day|strong="H4283"\w* God arranged \w for|strong="H4487"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w worm|strong="H8438"\w* which \w attacked|strong="H5221"\w* \w the|strong="H5221"\w* bush, \w so|strong="H5927"\w* \w that|strong="H5927"\w* \w it|strong="H5927"\w* wilted.

\w And|strong="H7218"\w* \w when|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w sun|strong="H8121"\w* \w rose|strong="H2224"\w*, God arranged \w a|strong="H3068"\w* hot \w east|strong="H6921"\w* \w wind|strong="H7307"\w*. \w And|strong="H7218"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w sun|strong="H8121"\w* \w beat|strong="H5221"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w Jonah|strong="H3124"\w*’s \w head|strong="H7218"\w*, \w so|strong="H1961"\w* \w that|strong="H5315"\w* \w he|strong="H5921"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w faint|strong="H5968"\w* \w and|strong="H7218"\w* \w begged|strong="H7592"\w* \w that|strong="H5315"\w* \w he|strong="H5921"\w* \w might|strong="H2416"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w*, saying, ‘\w It|strong="H5921"\w* \w is|strong="H5315"\w* \w better|strong="H2896"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H5315"\w* \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w* \w than|strong="H2896"\w* \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w live|strong="H2416"\w*.’

\w But|strong="H5921"\w* \w God|strong="H3190"\w* said \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w Jonah|strong="H3124"\w*, ‘\w Are|strong="H4194"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w doing|strong="H3190"\w* right \w in|strong="H5921"\w* being \w angry|strong="H2734"\w* \w about|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* bush?’ \w He|strong="H5704"\w* replied, ‘\w I|strong="H5704"\w* \w have|strong="H4194"\w* every right \w to|strong="H5704"\w* be \w as|strong="H5704"\w* \w angry|strong="H2734"\w* \w as|strong="H5704"\w* \w I|strong="H5704"\w* could possibly be!’ Jonah is rebuked

\w The|strong="H5921"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* said, ‘\w You|strong="H5921"\w* \w care|strong="H5921"\w* \w about|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* bush \w which|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* cost \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* trouble \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w which|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w made|strong="H1961"\w* \w grow|strong="H1431"\w*, \w which|strong="H3068"\w* \w came|strong="H1961"\w* \w up|strong="H1431"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w night|strong="H3915"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* wilted \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w night|strong="H3915"\w*.

\w Should|strong="H3225"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w care|strong="H5921"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w* \w Nineveh|strong="H5210"\w*, \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w which|strong="H5892"\w* \w there|strong="H3426"\w* \w are|strong="H3426"\w* \w one|strong="H3808"\w* hundred \w and|strong="H1419"\w* \w twenty|strong="H8147"\w* \w thousand|strong="H7239"\w* \w people|strong="H3808"\w* \w who|strong="H7227"\w* \w do|strong="H3426"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w their|strong="H5921"\w* \w right|strong="H3225"\w* \w hand|strong="H3225"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w their|strong="H5921"\w* \w left|strong="H8040"\w*; \w and|strong="H1419"\w* \w many|strong="H7227"\w* cattle \w too|strong="H5921"\w*?’
